translation.en: BFFs
♪ Tue-- Tue-- Tuesday My never-be-blues day ♪
♪ Kick-off-your-shoes day for... ♪
Sing it with me, Share. [grunts]
♪ BFF-picnic Tuesday ♪
Ooh! And the crowd goes wild. [chuckles] Thank you. Thank you.
[Share chuckles]
-I love our BFF Tuesday picnics, Harmony. -Me, too, sweetness.
Okay, have you got your famous Care-a-Lot cookies?
-Check. -Honey banana musical bars?
-Check. -Peanut butter, cranberry sauce,
marshmallow sandwiches sliced diagonally with the crusts off?
Check, check, check. I would never forget my BFF's favorite.
And I've got your second favorite and your third favorite,
all the way up to your seventeenth favorite.
Mm! Share, you always remember my favorite foods.
Now, that's a good friend.
I have lots of friends, Harmony.
But Tuesday is my favorite part of the week
because it's time I get to share with my BFF.
Best friends forever.
I feel the same way, Share.
These picnics are special for you and me.
You're such a good friend that sometimes you know--
What you're about to say before you say it.
[both laugh]
-That's why we're BFFs and-- -Always will be.
-To the Forest of Feelings, BFF. -Lead the way.
♪ Tuesday, Tuesday Never-be-blues day ♪
Wait a second, Share.
Something's going on.
Harmony! We need your help. It's a harmonic emergency.
Heh. More of a uke emergency.
See? 'Cause there's a ukulele stuck on his foot? [chuckles]
That's definitely a uke emergency.
Oh, you think that's bad?
[both laughing]
Oh, sure, go ahead, laugh at my uke emergency.
Grumpy, Tenderheart and I were rehearsing our ukulele band
and having a jamming time.
But then Brave Heart, Bright Heart and Wonderheart came along
collecting Care Hearts, and, well...
Brave Heart went this way...
While Wonder went that way...
-Making Brighto go that way. -And then:
[both making sound effects]
Ka-sproink!
-"Ka-sproink," huh? [both] Ka-sproink.
Definitely sounds like they need me, Share.
Would it be terrible if we put off our picnic for today?
Oh...
Oh, heh, that's okay.
After all, only you can repair a uke emergency. [chuckles]
Sorry, Share. Harmonic emergencies wait for no bear.
Even BFFs. But we'll do our picnic next week, okay?
Next week. Sure.
[chirping]
Huh?
Oh, it's nothing, Cozy.
Just that... well, I was supposed to go on a picnic with Harmony today,
and she had to cancel.
[cooing]
It is a lovely picnic. I packed it specially for me and my BFF.
And now I don't know what to do with it.
I mean, it's already packed and ready.
I shouldn't let it go to waste. Someone should eat it, right?
Hey, why not us?
[chirps]
Yeah.
Unless you're busy today...
[chirps]
Then let's go to the Forest of Feelings. You're gonna love this place.
-Almost there. Are you ready? [Cozy chirps]
Here... it... is.
Ta-da!
[chirps]
Harmony and I discovered this secluded spot.
It's the most amazing place in the whole Forest of Feelings,
and nobody else has ever seen it.
Until now.
[chirping]
Time for the best picnic ever.
-Huh? Ha! [Cozy] Ha!
[chirps]
[giggles]
[lightly snoring]
[chirping]
To get to the other side?
[laughs]
That's hilarious, Cozy.
[laughs]
[Harmony] Share? -Huh?
[Harmony sighing]
Restringing and tuning all those ukuleles was challenging.
But thanks to Harmony, our ukuleles are fixed,
and they sound totally radical.
[strumming]
Well, they will. Really. Heh.
I just haven't learned how to play the song yet.
Guess we'd better get back to our jam session. Later.
Well, I'm glad you were able to fix your harmonic uke emergency.
Yes, and it didn't take as long as I expected.
I got back as fast as I could
so we could go on our Tuesday no-blues-day
kick-off-your-shoes-day picnic after all.
That's okay, Harmony. I already went on the picnic.
Wait. You went on the picnic? Alone?
Nope. I brought Cozy along.
Oh. Oh, right. Of course you did.
After all, I did say I couldn't go, so... why wouldn't you go?
Yes. And don't worry, I still had a great time without you.
Uh... Worry?
I know you probably were concerned that I would be disappointed.
But Cozy and I had a blast. Right, Cozy?
So, you had fun, huh?
But was it as fun as when you and I spilled all that honey over our food?
[laughs] And we...
[laughing]
We ended up having a huge honey feast?
[laughing]
Oh, much more fun.
We had carrot-stick mustaches.
How fun is that?
Well, what about the time we sang "Row Your Boat"
at the top of our lungs, huh?
[laughing]
That was fun, but listen to this:
[both whistling]
[both laugh]
[groans]
Well, I guess you have a new BFF.
Ugh. What is this?
I cannot believe she just went with Cozy Heart Penguin.
I mean, some BFF she is.
That's our special place.
[groans] Breathe, girl.
Well, unless it's on a stage, Harmony is not about to be a solo artist.
[gasps]
Solo artist?
Oh. Sorry, Lotsa.
I was just thinking to myself that I might need a new BFF.
Oh. Well, I'll be your BFF.
What's a BFF?
[chuckles]
Best friend forever. [gasps]
And you would be a great one, Lottie.
Hey, how would you like to go on a picnic with me?
We'll have food and music and flowers and fun, fun, fun.
We could do it tomorrow.
A picnic tomorrow? Sure.
-What's the occasion? -Occasion?
Well, because...
it's Wednesday.
Yes. And I just decided that is my new special day.
♪ Wednesday, Wednesday That's my best-friends day ♪
Best friend. Oh, that's so nice.
-I've never had a BFF be-- -Before.
See? We finish each other's sentences.
It's just like we've been BFFs forever. [chuckles]
Tomorrow's gonna be the best picnic in Care Bear history.
You know, I'm always full of lots of love,
but, wow, Harmony,
you really know how to make a friend feel welcome.
I can't wait.
Oh, hey, did you guys just go on a picnic, too?
[chirps]
Yep, and then we sledded down in the picnic basket.
[laughs]
We did have the best time, huh, Cozy?
That sounds so fun.
And I can't wait to do some of those things, too.
Because guess what.
I'm going on a picnic tomorrow with my new BFF.
Ooh!
-Who's your new BFF? -Harmony.
Harmony is going on a picnic with someone other than me?
[grunts] Ow!
Lousy bush.
[gasps] Cozy!
We had such a good time today...
I think we ought to have another picnic tomorrow.
[cooing]
And I know it's going to be way better than Harmony's picnic.
What do you say, new BFF?
[Cozy chirps]
Now let's see...
We've got to make sure we have the best new treats.
I'll start baking tonight.
Share would always pack tasty treats for her picnic,
but she never had these special things in her basket.
Ukulele? Check.
Trumpet? Check.
Mini drum kit?
Oh, yeah. Checkity check and check and check.
Share's picnic basket may have been full of tastiness,
but mine's full of harmoniousness.
Hey, hey, Harmony.
Look, I picked a beautiful bouquet of flowers, just like you asked.
Oh! Thank you, Cheer.
They're the perfect addition to my picnic basket
for me and my new BFF, Lottie.
Whoa.
That is some picnic basket you got there, Harmony.
Flowers, musical instruments...
It's like a party in a basket.
Huh-huh. Party in a basket. Uh-huh.
[both laugh]
Isn't it great?
I mean, have you ever seen a picnic basket as good as that?
You know, my old BFF, Share,
yeah, she never packed one like this.
Huh? Old BFF?
Oh, nothing.
I'm just glad that you like it, Cheer.
In fact, how would you like to go with Lottie and me
on a picnic tomorrow?
Oh. Really? Me?
I would love, love, L-U-V, love to.
Oh. But if you and Lottie are going alone, then I wouldn't wanna cramp your style.
Are you kidding?
The more BFFs, the better. Come on along.
Really? [chuckles] Okay, great. Go, picnic!
Snapricot scones? Check.
Bumbleberry Bundt cake? Check.
Whoa-ho-ho.
I thought I'd seen the most lovely picnic basket of them all,
but now I'm thinking I was wrong.
I made it especially for my new BFF.
I have matching blanket and linens
and of course, the biggest assortment of goodies I've ever made.
Doesn't it look delicious?
Mm-mm! Yummy. It sure does.
Cheer, you should totally join us at our picnic tomorrow.
Oh, this basket is for tomorrow's picnic?
I already know all about it. And of course. I'll be there.
Wait, you knew? How did you--? Oh, never mind.
Meet us in the Forest of Feelings.
We'll have so much fun. The more BFFs, the better.
Almost there. Are you ready?
Here... it... is.
[both] Ta-da!
Share? What are you doing here?
Having a new-BFF picnic. What are you doing?
I'm having a new-BFF picnic.
-Come on, new BFF. -Come on, new BFF.
[chuckles] Oh!
Look, Lottie, this is the perfect place for our musical picnic.
Oh, Cozy, let's enjoy our delectable-delights picnic here,
where the light is just right.
Wow, Share, your picnic blanket sure is beautiful.
Lottie. Look at our picnic's perfect floral display.
[crashing noise]
Yes, it's very... fascinating.
Isn't it wonderful how at our picnic,
the blanket and the napkins all match, Cozy?
[chirping]
[both] Huh?
Eating is so much more fun to the sweet sounds of music,
wouldn't you agree, Lottie?
Well, yeah...
Yeah?
[grunts] But the best thing about this picnic
is I get to share it with my BFF, Cozy.
Well, the great thing about my picnic
is that I'm in perfect harmony with my BFF, Lottie.
Say, Harmony, this is fun and all...
but, uh, look at all these instruments.
What if we all play some music together?
What do you think, Cozy?
[chirps]
What? No. Why would you wanna do that?
Aren't you having fun with just me?
[both gasp]
No, let's not do that, Cozy.
We have so many other fun things going on, we won't have time to join their picnic.
[squawks]
Aw. Come on, you two.
Can we just remember how much we all love, love, love each other?
[coos]
Wait, Cozy.
That picnic doesn't have the sweet treats our picnic has.
Oh, Lottie, you gotta check out the rest of the great instruments I brought
for our picnic.
[Cozy chirps] [Lottie] Uh-oh.
-Okay, what are all these weird bushes? -They're growing all over the place.
[both] Ouch! [Cheer] Yoo-hoo!
Hello, guys? I'm so sorry I'm late. But I'm here for the pic...
...nic.
[chirps]
Cheer, we are so glad you're here.
Share and Harmony are--
Cheer, you made it. Come on over and join the fun on our side. Ah!
If you're joining the fun, you should be coming over here.
I invited Cheer.
[crashing noise]
Uh, I'm the one who invited her.
Actually, both of you invited me.
But I thought it was supposed to be one big picnic.
Oh, no, no, no, Cheer.
I invited you because our picnic is too awesome for just two, okay?
We need three BFFs
to complete the awesomeness that's happening over here.
Uh, if you want an awesomest extraordinary three-BFF picnicking experience, Cheer,
step right over here.
[Cheer] Okay. Oh, my. Wait a second.
Girls, listen. You've got to stop this.
Oh, no. Harmony? Share? Cozy? Lottie?
I can't even see you.
How am I ever going to get my friends out of there?
[humming]
Whoa! Ah! Ow! Ungh.
What are Jealouspikle Junipers doing here?
Ah. Let's see.
They seem to go right... over...
Ow! Hey, watch where you're...
uh, standing.
[chuckles] -Huh? Oh.
Hi, Beastly.
Well, what are you looking at?
[chirping]
No big deal, Cozy.
Our friendship is so strong, nothing can ruin our time together.
Not even a bunch of weird, sharp, bitter-smelling bushes.
Harmony, are we gonna do something about this?
You bet, Lottie.
This is a story we're gonna tell each other for years to come and laugh.
[laughs] Remember that time those crazy spiky bushes
tried to attack our BFF picnic?
[laughing]
Not that I care,
but how did those four get stuck in the Jealouspikle Junipers?
Jealouspikle Junipers? Is that what these things are?
Yeah. [chuckles]
I'm bitter and jealous all the time,
so, I've practically got a whole Jealouspikle garden. Mm.
[grunts]
Oh, yeah.
You've got some major jealousy going on over here.
But why are they growing right here?
Well, Cheer Bear, like all plants,
Jealouspikle Junipers grow out of the ground.
But instead of growing from water and sunlight,
these bushes grow from feelings of jealousy.
Ah.
-Jealousy, huh? -Oh, yeah.
And once you're a little jealous, that jealousy feeds on more jealousy.
All it takes is a little bit, and it grows and grows
and grows and grows and grows!
[both laughing]
[both laughing]
Whoa! Whoa. Wait.
Those Jealouspikle Junipers are dividing my friends from each other even more.
[chuckles] It's probably too late to save them.
The only spot left with no Jealouspikle Junipers
is right in the middle.
[gasps] Oh!
And that's exactly what they need to do: meet in the middle.
Hip, hip, hooray!
Hoorays o'clock. Go, Beastly. Go, Beastly.
Come on, you did it. You figured it out.
Give me some love, Beasters. Come on, bring it in. Bring it in.
Hey! Hands off the merchandise.
What do you think this is, a petting zoo? Gross!
[all laughing]
Ooh, ooh! Harmony. Share. Please stop.
These bushes are Jealouspikle Junipers, and they are being created by you.
-Us? -Us?
Yes with a double S-S. You.
You're both jealous of each other and your new friendships.
Please. That's ridiculous.
I am not jealous.
Even though you seem way happier without me as your BFF,
but you know, whatevs.
Pashaw. Me either. I'm totally fine.
Although you seem perfectly delighted now that I'm not your BFF.
[stutters]
Well, bears, something is causing these Junipers to grow.
Are you sure you're not feeling a little eensy-beensy-weensy bit jealous?
Well, I guess it did make me feel bad
when Share took Cozy to our special picnic place.
I kind of didn't want her to be happy, which made me feel even worse.
[Share sighs]
And I was afraid that Harmony would become better friends with Lottie than with me.
That made me feel afraid that I was losing my friend.
Jealousy makes you feel that way.
And that's why these bushes grew and pushed you two bears apart.
But you can fix things by getting back together.
Oh, come on, Share.
Are we gonna let a few Jealouspikle Junipers get in the way
of our friendship?
[both] Ow!
-That smarts. -Oh, no, Harmony.
I'm sorry I let jealousy come between us.
You know that I'll always be your BFF. [gasps]
Me, too, Share.
And I'm sorry I didn't tell you I was inviting Lottie today.
It doesn't mean that I don't love our special time together, too.
This is great.
You guys, the Jealouspikle Junipers need jealousy to grow,
but when you feel less jealous, they go away.
Keep going. Go, go, go.
Well, I'm actually glad now that we found new friends.
And knowing we will always have our special memories, too,
makes me feel less jealous.
Yeah. Having Lottie and Cozy here with us just makes it more fun.
We can all eat and play music.
-Aw, I missed you, Harmony. -I missed you, too, Share.
Look, you did it. You're out.
Cozy and I didn't know you were jealous because of us.
We don't wanna come between you.
[chirps]
Oh, no, Lottie, Cozy, you guys are the greatest.
Having new friends shouldn't take anything away from our old friends.
We know now that it doesn't mean our old friends are any less special.
We love you.
[all laughing]
Now that we're all back together,
let's make one big blanket for our group picnic.
Oh, and set out all the food together. And the flowers.
Each of us can play an instrument in the band.
[all laughing]
We did it. Let's have some fun.
Hey, Share, you know what today is?
-♪ Tue-- Tue-- Tuesday ♪ -♪ My never-be-blues day ♪
♪ Kick-off-your-shoes day For BFF-picnic Tuesday ♪
I've already told Cozy and Lottie to meet us there.
So, what do you say? Should we go?
[both grunt]
[both] Sproing-boing, cling-clang.
Yeah, yeah, let me guess.
-Ka-sproink? -[grunts] How'd you know?
Listen, Grumpy and Funshine,
I wanna help you again, but Tuesday is BFF-picnic day,
and I will not miss it again this week.
-Oh. -Okay.
But you two could join us on the picnic.
And I bet we could fix those ukuleles up really nicely on the way.
-Fixed ukes? -And a picnic?
